definition: small and weak/puny/the small and weak/children/women and children
weak/feeble/young/inferior/(following a decimal or fraction) slightly less than

sentences.english: When the British’s demands were not met, they opened fired on the far weaker Zanzibar.
sentences.chinese: 英國的要求沒人理，最後對弱小的桑給巴爾發起攻擊。

sentences.english: "I want that one, " the little boy said, pointing to the runt.
sentences.chinese: “我想要那一隻，”小男孩指着那隻弱小的狗崽兒說。

sentences.english: We are the sheep and you are the wolves .
sentences.chinese: 我們是弱小的羊，而你們是狼。

sentences.english: This may, in part, be a result of the ability of muscular men to intimidate 97lb weaklings.
sentences.chinese: 部份原因是，肌肉強勁的人容易脅迫97磅的弱小者。

sentences.english: As a roaring lion, and a hungry bear, so is a wicked prince over the poor people.

sentences.english: The smaller, weaker wolves knew how to obey the wolf leader.

sentences.english: My car was full of dread , it made me feel so weak .

sentences.english: They defeated the weakest of their enemies first, the Ridgers.
sentences.chinese: 首先被擊潰是一個弱小的敵人，山脊部落。

sentences.english: That said, many long-standing dollar bulwarks are looking weaker.
sentences.chinese: 這就是說，很多長期支持美元的壁壘開始變得弱小。

sentences.english: I will be weak body cowering in a corner of one side.
sentences.chinese: 我將弱小的身軀畏縮在牆角的某一面。

sentences.english: Don't you have some poor animal to disembowel?

sentences.english: "I want that one," the little boy said, pointing to the runt.
sentences.chinese: “我想要那一隻，”小男孩指着那隻弱小的狗崽說。

sentences.english: Animals reject the runt of the litter.
sentences.chinese: 動物會丟棄最弱小的幼仔。

sentences.english: We can complete us by a one kind of birthplace narration small and weak and are broad?
sentences.chinese: 我們能以一種貫一的敘述完成我們的弱小和恢弘嗎？

sentences.english: He lifts up the poor from the dust and the needy from the ash heap.
sentences.chinese: 從塵埃裏提拔弱小的人，由糞土中舉揚窮苦的人。

definition: to be unable to withstand a single blow/to collapse at the first blow
